verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar,<s%> but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>"
Then <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H6213>"Do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is with you."
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "You shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for Me to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in;

for I have not <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5927>brought<s%> up <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> but I have <S%H1961>gone<s%> from <S%H168>tent<s%> to <S%H168>tent<s%> and from [one] <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>place<s%> [to another.]

"In <S%H3605>all<s%> places <S%H834>where<s%> I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> with <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>'Why<s%> have you not <S%H1129>built<s%> for Me a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>?'"'

<S%H6258>"Now,<s%> therefore, <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "I <S%H3947>took<s%> you from the <S%H5116>pasture,<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> that you should be <S%H5057>leader<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And I have <S%H1961>been<s%> with you <S%H3605>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H1980>gone,<s%> and have <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H8034>name<s%> like the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>ones<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them, that they may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their own <S%H8478>place<s%> and be <S%H7264>moved<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H9390>wicked<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1086>waste<s%> them <S%H3254>anymore<s%> as <S%H7223>formerly,<s%>

even from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> [to be] <S%H5921>over<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And I will <S%H3665>subdue<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies.<s%> Moreover, I <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for you.

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> that you must <S%H1980>go<s%> [to be] with your fathers, that I will <S%H1>set<s%> up [one of] your <S%H6965>descendants<s%> <S%H2233>after<s%> you, <S%H310>who<s%> shall be of your <S%H834>sons;<s%> and I will <S%H1121>establish<s%> his <S%H3559>kingdom.<s%>
"He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> for Me a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

"I will be his father, and he shall be My <S%H1>son;<s%> and I will not <S%H1121>take<s%> My <S%H5493>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H2617>away<s%> from him, as I <S%H5493>took<s%> it from him <S%H5493>who<s%> was <S%H834>before<s%> you.

"But I will <S%H3427>settle<s%> him in My <S%H1004>house<s%> and in My <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>"' "

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2377>vision,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> am I, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4310>what<s%> is my <S%H1004>house<s%> that Thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H1988>this<s%> <S%H1988>far<s%>?

"And <S%H2088>this<s%> was a <S%H6994>small<s%> <S%H6994>thing<s%> in Thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> but Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of Thy servant's <S%H1004>house<s%> for a <S%H7350>great<s%> <S%H7350>while<s%> to <S%H7350>come,<s%> and hast <S%H7200>regarded<s%> me according to the <S%H8447>standard<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H4609>high<s%> <S%H4609>degree,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> can <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> [say] to Thee concerning the <S%H9202>honor<s%> [bestowed] on Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>? For Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

"O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for Thy servant's <S%H5668>sake,<s%> and according to Thine own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Thou hast <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> to <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> these <S%H1420>great<s%> <S%H1420>things.<s%>

"O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee, <S%H369>neither<s%> is <S%H369>there<s%> any <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2108>besides<s%> Thee, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>

"And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> for Himself [as] a <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> Thee a <S%H8034>name<s%> by <S%H1420>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H3372>things,<s%> in <S%H1644>driving<s%> out <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou didst <S%H6299>redeem<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?

"For Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> Thou didst <S%H5414>make<s%> Thine own <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> didst <S%H1961>become<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> let the <S%H1697>word<s%> that Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

"And let Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H539>established<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> [even] a <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee.'

"For Thou, O my <S%H430>God,<s%> hast <S%H1540>revealed<s%> <S%H241><s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> that Thou wilt <S%H1129>build<s%> for him a <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H4672>found<s%> [courage] to <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee.
"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou art <S%H430>God,<s%> and hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9186>good<s%> <S%H9186>thing<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> it hath <S%H2974>pleased<s%> Thee to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>continue<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee; for Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> hast <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> and it is <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"
